backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blog CRUD and user profiles with strict admin/user authorization using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests for the admin setup UI feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files related to marketing UI and app structure.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing how to build and deploy the project locally and to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with Growithtutor SEO metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, query client, and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin status before rendering admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating with Internet Identity and React Query cache.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty component file placeholder for a custom cursor implementation.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: Student enquiry form collecting basic details and showing contact options after submission.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: Teacher enquiry form capturing experience and multiple teaching preferences, then displaying contact actions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Simple contact form with validation and a thank‑you state after simulated submission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Site footer with navigation links, contact details, and social/WhatsApp/email shortcuts.
Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: Marketing contact section offering WhatsApp, call, SMS, and email options via UI cards.
Renders a FAQ section using an accordion fed by siteContent FAQs.
Displays the main hero banner with headline, subtext, CTA buttons, and an image.
Shows a four‑step process using cards with icons and descriptions.
Lists tutoring service categories as cards with icons and descriptions.
Shows testimonial cards with star ratings and content pulled from siteContent.
Displays trust statistics (experience, students, teachers) using icon cards.
Presents value propositions as cards highlighting strengths like expert tutors and results.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Exports structured terms and conditions content including sections and last‑updated date.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Provides structured marketing content for hero, value props, services, steps, and testimonials.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines contact info, form options, trust stats, testimonials, FAQs, and social links used across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, authentication flow, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets document title and meta description on page load or update.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for blog CRUD operations and user profile/admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining theme colors and typography.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp, SMS, and email links and message templates for student and teacher contact forms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blogs using dialogs and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Bootstrap page for granting admin access via a token, handling authentication state and admin validation.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post by ID, showing loading, not‑found, and published content views.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all published blog posts with previews and navigation to full posts, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page offering WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email options using site contact info and link helpers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page composed of multiple marketing sections with metadata setup.
Standalone marketing landing layout that sets page metadata manually and renders marketing sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Renders a setup checklist page listing configuration items with statuses and details. Uses page metadata and UI components to display each item.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form with page metadata and a styled header section. Embeds StudentEnquiryForm.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Renders the teacher registration form with metadata and a header section. Embeds TeacherEnquiryForm.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays terms and conditions content from legalContent with metadata and section rendering. Maps over sections to show titles and text.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend interface with an internal admin initialization method. Adds a secret-based access control initializer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters. Supports persisted parameters and hash-based routing.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Static HTML layout for the standalone landing page with sections populated by script.js. Includes header, navigation, sections, and footer.
Describes the standalone static landing page and how to run it locally. Lists included HTML, CSS, and JS files.
Defines editable content objects for the standalone landing page including hero, services, steps, testimonials, and FAQs. Drives dynamic rendering in index.html.
CSS styles for the standalone landing page covering layout, typography, sections, buttons, and responsive design.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and pending admin‑related feature requests for granting admin access and bootstrap initialization.
